title: (x) Cincinnati / Bold grotesque - various suggestions {Craig, Riccardo, Seb}
content:
Hi,

is there anyone who could tell me which font I could use that looks quite like the old Cinicinnati Milling one as shown on the attached picture?!

Thanks in advance.

P.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cincinnati machine.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141625/http:/typophile.com/files/cincinnati%20machine_0.jpg) | 73.33 KB |
author: hollenberger

comments.content: Avenir and Monod have similar shapes, but not enough weight. Eagle has the wrong N.
Eliason's suggestion is surely better than mine.
[Alright Sans Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141625/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/okay-type/alright-sans/ultra/) by Okay Type would also make a good match.
